name: Plastics Recyclers Europe
goal: We focus on the promotion of plastics recycling and the creation of conditions which enable profitable and sustainable business.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Environment, waste, chemical, trade and plastics legislations affecting the plastics recycling industry.
